Novo saopštenje iz Železnika: Ne želimo polemiku sa uticajnim tviterašima, ali…
04 Nov 2019, 13:00 by Darko
Posle reakcije predsednika KK Partizan Ostoje Mijailovića na saopštenje KK FMP, u Železniku su se ponovo latili pera i izdali novo saopštenje za javnost.
„Panteri“ od Partizana zahtevaju odgovor na pitanje zašto je utakmica 5. kola ABA lige bila katastrofalno organizovana.
Saopštenje KK FMP prenosimo u celosti:
– KK FMP ne želi bilo kakvu polemiku sa bilo kim, posebno ne sa „uticajnim tviterašima“ i jutjuberima, već odgovor na jednostavno i jasno pitanje – zašto je utakmica odigrana 02.11.2019. bila ista kao i sve prethodne kada je naš tim gostovao KK Partizan NIS? Dakle, tražimo pojašnjenje za nešto što je bilo, sve ostalo je čista zamena teza i namerno skretanje sa teme. Ili je možda u pitanju deficit u intiligenciji, jer ne razumete suštinu pitanja pa odgovarate na nešto što nije tema!
Dobri srpski domaćin koji vlada moderim tehnologijama poput društvenih mreža, sa druge strane ne shvata suštinu sporta – Rivalstvo ne podrazumeva mržnju. Odbijanje da se prihvati odgovornost je davanje podrške svemu onome što je pogrešno. Zreli, celoviti i ostvareni ljudi prihvataju odgovornost i trude se da nešto menjaju da bude bolje. Nedovršeni karakteri to ne mogu da urade, jer nemaju mentalnih, moralnih i ljudskih kapaciteta da se nose sa odgovornošću i nešto menjaju (ili ne smeju). Takvi samo plivaju u svom mediokritetskom mulju u kome se najbolje snalaze. Mi deo tog blata nećemo biti, niti želimo da nas neko uvlači u priče o budžetima, teorijama zavere, utakmicama sa kojima nemamo veze i koje će se tek odigrati. KK FMP kao srpski klub sa skoro 10 srpskih reprezentativaca bivših i sadašnjih (u seniorskim i mlađim kategorijama) samo traži odgovor na pitanje – zašto je utakmica 5.kola ABA lige koju je organizovao KK Partizan bila katastrofalno organizovana. Ponovo, navodi se u saopštenju kluba iz Železnika.

New announcement from Zeleznik: We do not want controversy with influential tweeters, but…
04 Nov 2019, 12:00 by Darko
Following the reaction of Partizan BC President Ostoja Mijailovic to the BCP FM press release, the pen was reopened in Zeleznik and a new press release was issued.
The Panthers demand Partizan to answer the question why the 5th round of the ABA League was disastrously organized.
We are transmitting the announcement of BC FMP in its entirety:
- BC FMP does not want any controversy with anyone, especially not with "influential tweeters" and daughters, but rather an answer to a simple and clear question - why the match was played on 02/11/2019. was the same as all the previous ones when our team visited BC Partizan NIS? So, we are looking for clarification for something that was, everything else is a pure replacement of theses and a deliberate diversion from the topic. Or maybe it's an intellectual deficiency, because you don't understand the essence of the question, so you're answering something that's not the topic!
A good Serbian host who rules modern technologies like social networks, on the other hand, does not understand the essence of sports - Rivalry does not imply hatred. Refusing to accept responsibility is to support all that is wrong. Mature, whole and accomplished people accept responsibility and strive to change something for the better. Unfinished characters cannot do this because they lack the mental, moral and human capacity to cope with responsibility and change something (or not). Such people are just swimming in their media-sludge where they can best handle it. We are not going to be a part of that mud, nor do we want to be dragged into stories about budgets, conspiracy theories, matches that we have nothing to do with and that are about to take place. BC FMP as a Serbian club with almost 10 Serbian national team members, former and current (in the senior and junior categories) is just looking for an answer to the question - why was the 5th round of the ABA League organized by BC Partizan disastrously organized. Again, according to a statement from the Zeleznik club.
